content:
Medical student at the University of Tours. I work on neuroimaging, neuroinformatics and Machine and Deep Learning. I recently worked on neuroimaging as part of the Long COVID. My PhD in neuroscience will investigate a new way to train an AI classifier for better neurological and psychiatric diagnosis based on neuroimaging. We will first test a new preprocessing with a surface, multimodality and projection approach. Then, we will test GNN solutions with graph representations.
Using many tools :
 Clinica, AramisLab Freesurfer 6 R, Python TensorFlow, Pytorch Pytorch Geometric  Also skilled as web developper using :
 Azure, OVH Github VueJS, JQuery Bootstrap, Element PHP, Laravel, SailsJS Wordpress, Drupal, Prestashop

My PhD in neuroscience will investigate a new way to train an AI classifier for better neurological and psychiatric diagnosis based on neuroimaging.
title: Jacques-Yves Campion
The impact of COVID-19 lockdown on brain metabolism

summary: Review of the latest interesting technologies and discussion on how to adapt the European environment to become more innovative. Presentation of a small study on natural language processing using media data to address how Europe is perceived and talked about in the media, over time and through recent crises. Presentation of the new versions of the website.
